entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY VERY LIGHT DRIZZLE THIS MORNING
COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
